verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: Say, "I take refuge with the Lord of Daybreak.
verse.verse_2: From the evil of what He created.
verse.verse_3: And from the evil of the darkness as it gathers.
verse.verse_4: And from the evil of those who practice sorcery.
verse.verse_5: And from the evil of an envious when he envies."
